Reviews.Title: LITTLE CAMERA TO GO
Reviews.Author: Pat de
Reviews.Content: This purchase was made to replace another camera.  I chose the Samsung EC-ES80 Digital because this camera is basically an upgraded version of the Samsung I had.  That camera was used to take literally thousands of pictures in the six years I owned it.  Since I don't require a lot of bells and whistles on my cameras, I went with the Samsung EC-ES80.The only disappointment I have with this camera which I also had with my previous one is that pictures taken on a cloudy day or at night - even at dusk - have a tendency to be dark. Other than that, I think this is a great little camera and I hope it serves me as well as its predecessor.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera worked like a champion from the very beginning. It produces beautiful stable images. It is completely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Just a Camera
Reviews.Author: Jay Endo "Jay Endo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take pictures of items and place them on e-bay. My budget was low... around a hundred dollars. This fit it and I'm happy with the purchase. I would not use this Camera for wedding photos LOL... The Zoom is not very good and it likes to use its flash on everything in automatic mode..... This causes the pictures to be over lit. This Camera is not any better than the camera on many phones so I only use it too take photos for ebay. If your looking for a camera too take on trip spend some more money.... you wont be happy with this ones performance. Again its not bad... very EZ too use but has some complicated menu's that are not user friendly. It works... its cheap... 3 stars

Reviews.Title: I wish it mentioned it didn t come with battery!!! It was a pain getting one!
Reviews.Author: hatim hansali
Reviews.Content: MOre transparency up front would have been appreciated. It was very incovenient to get a charger and a battery online 2 weeks later to be able to use the camera.The camera itself was fine.

Reviews.Title: I love my little camera
Reviews.Author: P. Mine
Reviews.Content: I take this camera everywhere. It's easy to use, or at least it is for what I use it for. Simple. Takes nice photos. Slim, holds a good long charge. I take a lot of photos, and I've had this camera for about a year now.. and it's great. I'll get another Samsung if and when this one wears out.

Reviews.Title: Small and toyish but quite good
Reviews.Author: Eyal Siryon
Reviews.Content: My wife just purchased this camera and started using it. well I must say that is seems to be too small and too much a toy look a like but the results are nice and the camera works well and fast.not bad for the small price and the small size!!

Reviews.Title: I like
Reviews.Author: Ruben Diaz
Reviews.Content: I bought it, and I am happy, This product is very good, I am from Venezuela.Este producto me salio bueno y vino en excellente condiciones.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Alex Falcon
Reviews.Content: I recomend this buyer it is quick and responsable and the thing a bought it is as expected buy a recomend them

Reviews.Title: Review of Samsung Digital Camera EC-ES80 by JPema
Reviews.Author: john pema
Reviews.Content: I found the Samsung EC-ES80 digital camera, compact and with it controls conveniently arranged, making it easy to use. The outdoors shots were sharp and clear. However, the indoors shots, without flash, were just the opposite. They seemed to be out of focus. One of the most desirable features of today's digital cameras is their ability to take pictures in conditions less than ideal and yet still get good results.

Reviews.Title: Lol......
Reviews.Author: K9
Reviews.Content: Frys has been selling this unit for 29.99 for quite some time now, and whos going to buy this? drop the price dude.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Purchase
Reviews.Author: tstickney28
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in silver off of Amazon.com and I received an email from the company saying that they weren't going to fulfill my order because the purchase price was too low. So they are canceling my order even though the money was already taken out of my account to pay for these cameras!

Reviews.Title: Complaint on order of Samsung EC-ES80 Digital Camera  Co. Bookstore and Amazon canncelled my order after confirming purchase.
Reviews.Author: Cleo F Wicks
Reviews.Content: I'm disappointed in Amazon and the Company Bookstore that was selling this item.  The price dropped as I was looking at this item, so I purchased it.  To receive emails that the purchase was confirmed and the two days later, emails that they had an error and canceled my order.  I think what the price showed is what I paid and they should not be able to cancel my order  I will think twice before I purchase again.  Hope that won't happen to other people.Cleo from Mn
